text: Phira jadom tusim apane haja de manasika (haja di parikri'a) pura kara lavo tam alaha nu yada karom jisa tar'ham tusim pahilam apane bapa dadi'am nu yada karade si. Sagom usa tom vi zi'ada. Lokam vicom ko'i manukha kahida hai, he sade raba! Sanu vaise sasara vica sabha kujha de ate praloka vica usa da kujha hisa nahim
